@version 0.2.0

module LambdaCube.GL

-- | 32-bit signed integer type
data Int32 :: *

-- | 32-bit unsigned integer type
data Word32 :: *
uniformBool :: ByteString -> Trie InputSetter -> SetterFun Bool
uniformV2B :: ByteString -> Trie InputSetter -> SetterFun V2B
uniformV3B :: ByteString -> Trie InputSetter -> SetterFun V3B
uniformV4B :: ByteString -> Trie InputSetter -> SetterFun V4B

uniformV2U :: ByteString -> Trie InputSetter -> SetterFun V2U
uniformV3U :: ByteString -> Trie InputSetter -> SetterFun V3U
uniformV4U :: ByteString -> Trie InputSetter -> SetterFun V4U
uniformInt :: ByteString -> Trie InputSetter -> SetterFun Int32
uniformV2I :: ByteString -> Trie InputSetter -> SetterFun V2I
uniformV3I :: ByteString -> Trie InputSetter -> SetterFun V3I
uniformV4I :: ByteString -> Trie InputSetter -> SetterFun V4I

uniformV2F :: ByteString -> Trie InputSetter -> SetterFun V2F

uniformV4F :: ByteString -> Trie InputSetter -> SetterFun V4F

uniformM32F :: ByteString -> Trie InputSetter -> SetterFun M32F
uniformM33F :: ByteString -> Trie InputSetter -> SetterFun M33F
uniformM34F :: ByteString -> Trie InputSetter -> SetterFun M34F
uniformM42F :: ByteString -> Trie InputSetter -> SetterFun M42F
uniformM43F :: ByteString -> Trie InputSetter -> SetterFun M43F
uniformM44F :: ByteString -> Trie InputSetter -> SetterFun M44F
uniformFTexture2D :: ByteString -> Trie InputSetter -> SetterFun TextureData
data Buffer
compileBuffer :: [Array] -> IO Buffer
updateBuffer :: Buffer -> [(Int, Array)] -> IO ()
bufferSize :: Buffer -> Int
arraySize :: Buffer -> Int -> Int
arrayType :: Buffer -> Int -> ArrayType
data Renderer
compileRenderer :: GPOutput SingleOutput -> IO Renderer
slotUniform :: Renderer -> Trie (Trie InputType)
slotStream :: Renderer -> Trie (FetchPrimitive, Trie InputType)
uniformSetter :: Renderer -> Trie InputSetter
render :: Renderer -> IO ()
dispose :: Renderer -> IO ()
setScreenSize :: Renderer -> Word -> Word -> IO ()
samplerOutput :: Renderer -> Trie TextureData
data Object
addObject :: Renderer -> ByteString -> Primitive -> Maybe (IndexStream Buffer) -> Trie (Stream Buffer) -> [ByteString] -> IO Object
removeObject :: Renderer -> Object -> IO ()
objectUniformSetter :: Object -> Trie InputSetter
enableObject :: Object -> Bool -> IO ()
compileTexture2DRGBAF :: Bool -> Bool -> Bitmap Word8 -> IO TextureData
updateTexture2DRGBAF :: TextureData -> Bool -> Bitmap Word8 -> IO ()
data V2 a :: * -> *
V2 :: SrictNotUnpackeda -> SrictNotUnpackeda -> V2 a
data V3 a :: * -> *
V3 :: SrictNotUnpackeda -> SrictNotUnpackeda -> SrictNotUnpackeda -> V3 a
data V4 a :: * -> *
V4 :: SrictNotUnpackeda -> SrictNotUnpackeda -> SrictNotUnpackeda -> SrictNotUnpackeda -> V4 a
type M22F = V2 V2F
type M23F = V3 V2F
type M24F = V4 V2F
type M32F = V2 V3F
type M33F = V3 V3F
type M34F = V4 V3F
type M42F = V2 V4F
type M43F = V3 V4F
type M44F = V4 V4F
type V2F = V2 Float
type V3F = V3 Float
type V4F = V4 Float
type V2I = V2 Int32
type V3I = V3 Int32
type V4I = V4 Int32
type V2U = V2 Word32
type V3U = V3 Word32
type V4U = V4 Word32
type V2B = V2 Bool
type V3B = V3 Bool
type V4B = V4 Bool
data PointSpriteCoordOrigin :: *
LowerLeft :: PointSpriteCoordOrigin
UpperLeft :: PointSpriteCoordOrigin
data PointSize :: *
PointSize :: Float -> PointSize
ProgramPointSize :: PointSize
data PolygonOffset :: *
NoOffset :: PolygonOffset
Offset :: Float -> Float -> PolygonOffset
data FrontFace :: *
CCW :: FrontFace
CW :: FrontFace
data PolygonMode :: *
PolygonPoint :: PointSize -> PolygonMode
PolygonLine :: Float -> PolygonMode
PolygonFill :: PolygonMode
data ProvokingVertex :: *
FirstVertex :: ProvokingVertex
LastVertex :: ProvokingVertex
data CullMode :: *
CullNone :: CullMode
CullFront :: FrontFace -> CullMode
CullBack :: FrontFace -> CullMode
type DepthFunction = ComparisonFunction
data ComparisonFunction :: *
Never :: ComparisonFunction
Less :: ComparisonFunction
Equal :: ComparisonFunction
Lequal :: ComparisonFunction
Greater :: ComparisonFunction
Notequal :: ComparisonFunction

Always :: ComparisonFunction
data StencilOperation :: *
OpZero :: StencilOperation
OpKeep :: StencilOperation
OpReplace :: StencilOperation
OpIncr :: StencilOperation
OpIncrWrap :: StencilOperation
OpDecr :: StencilOperation

FuncAdd :: BlendEquation
FuncSubtract :: BlendEquation

Min :: BlendEquation
Max :: BlendEquation
data BlendingFactor :: *
Zero :: BlendingFactor

data LogicOperation :: *
Clear :: LogicOperation
And :: LogicOperation
AndReverse :: LogicOperation
Copy :: LogicOperation
AndInverted :: LogicOperation
Noop :: LogicOperation
Xor :: LogicOperation
Or :: LogicOperation
Nor :: LogicOperation
Equiv :: LogicOperation
Invert :: LogicOperation
OrReverse :: LogicOperation
CopyInverted :: LogicOperation
OrInverted :: LogicOperation
Nand :: LogicOperation
Set :: LogicOperation
data StencilOps :: *
StencilOps :: StencilOperation -> StencilOperation -> StencilOps

-- | Used for front faced triangles and other primitives.
frontStencilOp :: StencilOps -> StencilOperation

-- | Used for back faced triangles.
backStencilOp :: StencilOps -> StencilOperation
data StencilTests :: *
StencilTests :: StencilTest -> StencilTest -> StencilTests
data StencilTest :: *
StencilTest :: ComparisonFunction -> Int32 -> Word32 -> StencilTest

-- | The function used to compare the <tt>stencilReference</tt> and the
--   stencil buffers value with.
stencilComparision :: StencilTest -> ComparisonFunction

-- | The value to compare with the stencil buffer's value.
stencilReference :: StencilTest -> Int32

-- | A bit mask with ones in each position that should be compared and
--   written to the stencil buffer.
stencilMask :: StencilTest -> Word32
data Filter :: *
PointFilter :: Filter
LinearFilter :: Filter
data EdgeMode :: *
Repeat :: EdgeMode
MirroredRepeat :: EdgeMode
ClampToEdge :: EdgeMode
ClampToBorder :: EdgeMode
type InputSetter = Input Setter
type BufferSetter = (Ptr () -> IO ()) -> IO ()

ArrWord8 :: ArrayType
ArrWord16 :: ArrayType
ArrWord32 :: ArrayType
ArrInt8 :: ArrayType
ArrInt16 :: ArrayType
ArrInt32 :: ArrayType
ArrFloat :: ArrayType
ArrHalf :: ArrayType
data Array
Array :: ArrayType -> Int -> BufferSetter -> Array

TriangleStrip :: Primitive

TriangleFan :: Primitive
LineStrip :: Primitive

PointList :: Primitive

TWord :: StreamType
TV2U :: StreamType

ConstWord :: Word32 -> Stream b
ConstV2U :: V2U -> Stream b
ConstV3U :: V3U -> Stream b
ConstV4U :: V4U -> Stream b
ConstInt :: Int32 -> Stream b
ConstV2I :: V2I -> Stream b

ConstV4I :: V4I -> Stream b

streamType :: Stream b -> StreamType

streamStart :: Stream b -> Int
streamLength :: Stream b -> Int
data IndexStream b
IndexStream :: b -> Int -> Int -> Int -> IndexStream b
indexBuffer :: IndexStream b -> b
indexArrIdx :: IndexStream b -> Int
indexStart :: IndexStream b -> Int

data TextureData
TextureData :: GLuint -> TextureData

type SetterFun a = a -> IO ()

module LambdaCube.GL.Mesh
loadMesh :: ByteString -> IO Mesh
saveMesh :: ByteString -> Mesh -> IO ()
addMesh :: Renderer -> ByteString -> Mesh -> [ByteString] -> IO Object
compileMesh :: Mesh -> IO Mesh
updateMesh :: Mesh -> [(ByteString, MeshAttribute)] -> Maybe MeshPrimitive -> IO ()
data Mesh
Mesh :: Trie MeshAttribute -> MeshPrimitive -> Maybe GPUData -> Mesh
mAttributes :: Mesh -> Trie MeshAttribute
mPrimitive :: Mesh -> MeshPrimitive
mGPUData :: Mesh -> Maybe GPUData
data MeshPrimitive
P_Points :: MeshPrimitive
P_TriangleStrip :: MeshPrimitive
P_Triangles :: MeshPrimitive
P_TriangleStripI :: (Vector Int32) -> MeshPrimitive
P_TrianglesI :: (Vector Int32) -> MeshPrimitive
data MeshAttribute
A_Float :: (Vector Float) -> MeshAttribute
A_V2F :: (Vector V2F) -> MeshAttribute
A_V3F :: (Vector V3F) -> MeshAttribute
A_V4F :: (Vector V4F) -> MeshAttribute
A_M22F :: (Vector M22F) -> MeshAttribute
A_M33F :: (Vector M33F) -> MeshAttribute
A_M44F :: (Vector M44F) -> MeshAttribute
A_Int :: (Vector Int32) -> MeshAttribute
A_Word :: (Vector Word32) -> MeshAttribute
instance Binary Mesh
instance Binary MeshPrimitive
instance Binary MeshAttribute
instance Storable a => Binary (Vector a)
